author: veithen
msg: JMS transport tests: Explicitly set the data directory for the ActiveMQ broker. This avoids creation of an activemq-data directory in the root folder of the Maven module.

author: veithen
msg: * Created new Maven module synapse-utils and moved the TemporaryData class to this module.
* Updated dependencies of syanapse-core and synapse-transports.
* Added getLength and writeTo methods to TemporaryData.
* Modified Axis2HttpRequest to use TemporaryData for HTTP 1.0 requests.
